ComicInfo.Summary: Infiltrating his own country's government in 1962, Void Stalin convinces Nikita Krushchev to seek the aid of the island nation of Cuba to give the USSR better nuclear parity against the U.S. It's all part of Stalin's plot to conquer the world by nuclear holocaust—with his own allies' nations protected, of course. That includes his newest ally: Cuba Commander! Time Lincoln and the Travelers Teammust defuse this plot before it goes off—if they can survive an army of killer Sputnik satellites first!
